title: Gregg Wallace pokes fun at 21-year age gap with wife after welcoming baby Sid
text:

Masterchef legend Gregg Wallace has made fun of the age gap with wife Anne-Marie.

The couple welcomed baby boy Sid in May after two years of trying to get pregnant.

Just as Gregg, 54, and Anna, 33, had settled on IVF after two years of trying for a baby, she conceived naturally.

Gregg's had a laugh about the 21 year age gap between him and his fourth wife, joking to The Star on Sunday : "I'm really pleased Anna has had a baby - it's someone at home more her own age to talk to."

He gushed of Sid's birth: "I saw him take his first breath. It was just beautiful. I looked at him and thought he was perfect."

He already has two grownup kids, 24 year-old Tom and 21 year-old Libby, from his marriage to second wife Denise.

(Image: UK Press via Getty Images)

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX)

Fans have been quick to compliment Gregg recently, as hes started posting topless snaps of himself showing off a toned torso.

He revealed: "I'm not doing it because I think it's in any way attarctive.

"I'm doing it because I'm quite proud I'm 55 soon and I've managed to get this fit. Anna complains when I photograph myself with my top off.

"She went, 'Can you stop showing women your torso?'"

Gregg added that diets don't do it for him when it comes to keeping off the pounds.

(Image: BBC/Shine TV)

He continued: "I don't like diets at all. I really do not like the idea of diets.

"I've never dieted but I lost a lot of weight. It's not about doing something for a little while, it's about moving yourself into a healthier place forever.

"I've got a gym instructor called Danny. He writes a programme and we work together. It literally is like loads of weights and a bit of cardio and a bit of swimming.

"And what's really good is long walks."

Gregg and Anna first struck up a romance when they bonded over a love of food.

Anna got in contact with him via Twitter to ask for some kitchen advice, and the two bonded from there.

At their wedding in August 2016, Gregg's Masterchef co-host John Torode was the best man.
description: Gregg laughed about the 21 year age gap between him and his wife as he gushed about seeing the birth of his third child
